descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/iQeTpfQ.jpg[/img]
[i][color=#f4f4f4]"She had her whole life set out before her. She was supposed to inherit the family business, she was supposed to get married, she was supposed to grow old and have a happy life. But now she's here not where she's supposed to be. Not where her family would have wanted... They wouldn't have wanted her to learn how to fight. How to survive. They would have wanted her to have everything handed to her on a silver platter. But that's not what she wanted... So she ran. She ran from Valenwood to Skyrim and along that journey she managed to pick up some skills to help her survive in the wilds.... But she was to Naive she had gotten captured by bandits on the border of Skyrim. Thankfully though she was saved by the guards of Whiterun."
[/color][/i]
[i]Penelope now resides in the Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun you can find her there!


[color=#ead1dc]Name: Penelope 
Age: 18
Weight: 0
Class: Conjurer 
Levels with the player 
Essential
Marriable

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qU9QI94.jpg[/img]

Requires:
Skyrim Up to Date


[size=4]Recommendations
[/size]Face light 
Extensive follower framework
Ciri Armor 
Follower commentary overhaul


[/color][/i]
